en.title: Software Engineer
content: **1. Corporate Website Development**: Collaborated with front-end engineers to convert static templates into dynamic websites using Vue.js and ASP.NET MVC architecture

**2. CMS Development**: Led requirement analysis and system design. Developed the front end using Vue.js and integrated TinyMCE for visual content editing. Implemented the back end with .NET Core and designed a flexible, extensible database structure using the EAV model
**3. Legacy System Integration**: Planned and designed new system features, organized phased rollouts, and ensured smooth system transitions without disrupting existing operations

**4. Automation Tool Implementation**: Developed PowerShell Remoting scripts to connect and perform security scans across multiple servers. Used Task Scheduler to automate recurring tasks, significantly reducing manual workload

**5. UI Plugin Development**: Created custom C# components and JavaScript plugins (e.g., personnel selector, dynamic dropdown menus). Delivered integration documentation to the front-end team, improving development speed and maintainability

**6. Cross-Department Collaboration**: Migrated internal enterprise forms to responsive design. Collaborated with design and development teams, established a clear implementation process, and held regular review meetings to enhance maintainability and optimize user experience

zh.title: 軟體工程師
content: **1. 開發公司網站**：與前端工程師合作，將靜態切版轉換為Vue.js 框架、ASP .NET MVC架構網站等經驗
**2. 開發CMS網站**：主導需求訪談與系統設計，前端採用 Vue.js開發，使用 TinyMCE 實現可視化內容編輯，後端採用 .NET Core 架構以及 EAV 資料庫設計，實現資料彈性擴充
**3. 整合新舊系統**：規劃與設計新系統功能，並安排階段性切換，確保系統能順利過渡
**4. 導入自動化工具**： 撰寫 PowerShell Remoting ，連接至多台伺服器執行一系列安全性掃描，並使用 Task Scheduler 自動化定期執行任務，減少手動操作
**5. 撰寫UI插件**：開發 C# 控制元件與 JavaScript 插件（如人員選擇功能、動態下拉選單等），並提供文檔交付前端團隊整合與自定義，提升開發效率
**6. 跨部門合作**：將企業內部各表單導入響應式設計。與設計、前後端團隊合作，建立導入流程，定期開會與調整，提升維護效率，並優化使用者體驗

en.title: Research Assistant
content: **1. Database System Optimization**: Responsible for converting Excel, PDF, and other documents into structured data. Developed a data management interface using Python Flask and MongoDB, supporting data creation, editing, deletion, search, and export functionalities

**2. Data Visualization**: Utilized ShinyApp to build interactive dashboards, presenting descriptive analytics, trend charts, mosaic plots, and social network graphs to help non-technical users understand complex data

**3. Data Analysis**: Scraped data from international news websites and designed a workflow for text segmentation and keyword extraction using Python spaCy and R’s udpipe. Built and integrated custom keyword dictionaries. Experienced in processing large-scale data using Hadoop and Spark
**4. Industry Insights**: Extracted business insights based on analytical results and visualizations. Composed analytical reports and provided strategic recommendations to support decision-making

zh.title: 研究助理
content: **1. 優化資料庫系統**：負責將 Excel、PDF 等文檔轉換為結構化資料，使用 Python Flask 與 MongoDB 開發資料管理介面，支援資料新增、編輯、刪除、搜尋與匯出等功能
**2. 資料視覺化**：善用ShinyApp 製作互動式儀表板，呈現敘述性分析、趨勢圖、馬賽克圖與社群網路圖，協助非技術用戶理解數據內容
**3. 數據分析**：爬取國外新聞網站資料，設計文字斷詞與關鍵字分析流程，使用 Python spaCy 與 R 的 udpipe，並整合自建關鍵字字典。具備 Hadoop 與 Spark 的大數據處理經驗
**4. 產業洞察**：根據分析結果與視覺化圖表，萃取產業洞察，撰寫分析報告並提供決策建議
